original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2056)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2056)@</color>目標範圍內，從地底噴發巨大的火柱，灼燒敵人並以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2056)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2056)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2056)@</color>Within the target range, a huge pillar of fire erupts from the ground, burning the enemy with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2056)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color>Inflict spell damage on the enemy.
